body_html:
hit ERROR: Unrecognized option: --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false on bazel 0.16.1. downgrading to 0.16.0 also hit this.

According to https://blog.bazel.build/2018/04/11/bazel-0.12.html
this flag was removed in 0.12

Then downgrading to 0.11.1 solved this issue.
body_text:
hit ERROR: Unrecognized option: --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false on bazel 0.16.1. downgrading to 0.16.0 also hit this.
According to https://blog.bazel.build/2018/04/11/bazel-0.12.html
this flag was removed in 0.12
Then downgrading to 0.11.1 solved this issue.
body:
hit `ERROR: Unrecognized option: --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false` on bazel `0.16.1`. downgrading to `0.16.0` also hit this. 

According to https://blog.bazel.build/2018/04/11/bazel-0.12.html
this flag was removed in `0.12`

Then downgrading to `0.11.1` solved this issue.
